dcterms:creator: I. Yildirim
R. A. Jacobs
dcterms:description: A dataset used for studying the transfer of recognition between auditory and visual modalities, focusing on sequence category knowledge.
dcterms:title: Visual-auditory dataset

dcterms:creator: I. Yildirim
R. A. Jacobs
dcterms:description: A dataset exploring the transfer of object category knowledge across visual and haptic modalities through experimental and computational studies.
dcterms:title: Visual-haptic dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Al Roumi
S. Marti
L. Wang
M. Amalric
S. Dehaene
dcterms:description: A dataset that investigates how spatial sequences are mentally compressed in human working memory using numerical and geometrical primitives.
dcterms:title: Octagon spatial sequences dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Sun
C. L. Giles
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on sequence learning, encompassing tasks such as recognition, prediction, and sequential decision making.
dcterms:title: Sequence learning dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Wang
M. Amalric
W. Fang
X. Jiang
C. Pallier
S. Figueira
M. Sigman
S. Dehaene
dcterms:description: A dataset that examines the representation of spatial sequences using nested rules in the human prefrontal cortex.
dcterms:title: Spatial sequence dataset
